ProductInfo.Features:
16-Channel H.264 DVR with 1 terabyte hard drive.
Pan-Tilt-Zoom camera with 650 TV lines of resolution, 65 Ft night vision
7 weatherproof bullet cameras with 600 TV lines of resolution, 120 Ft Night vision
Night Vision: Up to 120 Ft. in the dark with 42 infrared LEDs
iPhone, iPad, Android,  Blackberry and Windows Mobile Phone and Windows 7 phone remote viewing
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See 16 Channel Security System with 1TB Hard Drive & 1 PTZ + 7 600TVL weatherproof cameras
